name: Gergely Orosz
description: Gergely writes The Pragmatic Engineer, the #1 technology newsletter on Substack. Formerly a software engineer and engineering manager at Uber, he is also the author of The Software Engineer’s Guidebook and other books on building software at scale.

name: Agur Jõgi
description: Agur Jõgi is the CTO at Pipedrive, where he leads development, infrastructure, and the company's next-generation tech vision. Previously Strategy and Innovation Lead at Deloitte NEXT, he brings executive experience as CIO, CTO, and COO across IT, banking, and telecom.

name: Dominik Kundel
description: Dominik is currently working on Developer Experience & SDKs at OpenAI. Previously he lead Product & Design for Twilio's Emerging Tech & Innovation organization. Dominik loves tinkering with anything that can run JavaScript, from front-end servers to CLIs and coffee machines. You can find him tweeting @dkundel and in his spare time he's working on cocktails, food and photography.
